title: Selects: The Tylenol Murders, Part I
itunes:title: Selects: The Tylenol Murders, Part I
description:
On one terrible day in Chicago in 1982, seven people died suddenly and mysteriously. In just a matter of hours, it becomes clear, someone has poisoned bottles of Extra-Strength Tylenol, one of the most trusted and widely-used products in America. Learn all about it in this classic episode.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
